showScoreExcerpt:
“To clear up the obvious question, ‘Bad Cinderella,’ which opened at the Imperial Theater Thursday night, isn’t good...it is a muddled and momentum-less retooling of the familiar fairy tale in search of a coherent point of view as if it were a glass-slippered foot.”
